| History                 = The Bombardiers were a gang who would be hired by landlords to destroy their own buildings using the Bombardiers specially designed craft, to collect on the insurance money. After the destruction of the Savoy Hotel their activities were brought to the attention of [[Thor Odinson (Earth-616)|Don Blake/Thor]] and [[Nathaniel Alexander Byrd (Earth-616)|Blackbyrd]]. The pair, assisted by [[Amos (Cat) (Earth-616)|Amos]] were able to capture the gang.{{r|Thor Vol 1 309}}
